name: Leap of faith (Evander QASMAT example)
description: This is just a small game I made for a digital technologies class where the goal was to document the process of making any game using any program, they recommended scratch or gamemaker, but I like actually coding, so I used godot. I just made a tiny game over 4 hours and wrote about how I made it. It isn't very good, especially for applying for QASMAT, but all the other work that I've had this term have been sitten exams
